name: OAK
description: Oak was developed at the 2016 Global Gam Jam by Fire Horse, a small game dev studio in São Paulo, Brazil, and with the help of José Roberto Cahali.This is a experimental game for us, very different from what we are used to do, so any feedback is very welcome. If you'd like to see this game become a bigger project or if we should just scratch it, let us know! Thanks for playing!
